title: Over 20+ games with mecha sion, have not once heard "Unstoppable" when ulting

replies.body:
Hey Omega T33mo -

This line should definitely be in there, although the play rate may be a lot lower than his other lines for his ult. The audio engineer who worked on this skin is taking a look at this today. :)
When I have him in my game all I hear is a funky machine noise (no voice) unless he's actually on my screen.
